Hello.  How does this work?
Hello! Welcome to Good-Loop
I want to know more about ethical advertising.
Great :)
Do you represent a business that wants to advertise?
Yes, i represent a greaat local greengrocer - tattie shaws
Lovely. OK - Let's get you setup with a free account, and you can explore Good-Loop's ethical advertising for local businesses.
Click on the "Small Business" button
Thank you, will do
Can I choose more than one format?
Pick one for now. You can always make _more_ adverts later.
I can't see anything in my preview.  Should i have loaded more content?
Scroll down below the preview - you can enter your logo below.
What is cta text?
CTA = Call to Action -- It's the text on the main button
Pick something encouraging, such as "Let's go!" or "Get a 20% discount!" (if you offer one).
Done that.  What next?  is that it?
Great. Now hit the (Record) button to make a video.
It says re-record - is that the one?
